name: Sjouke Mauw
content: Sjouke Mauw Sjouke Mauw SaToSS » Members » Sjouke Mauw SaToSS home Home Publications Contact Short CV Miscellaneous I am full professor in "Security and Trust of Software Systems" at the University of Luxembourg and head of the Department of Computer Science. I am leading the SaToSS research group. Research My research focuses on formalising and applying formal reasoning to real-world security problems and trust issues. Current research topics: Security protocols Security assessment Privacy Attack trees RFID security E-voting Trust and risk management Contract signing protocols Digital Rights Management Mobile ad-hoc and sensor networks Security and Trust of Software Systems Belval Campus, Maison du Nombre (3rd floor), 6 avenue de la Fonte, L-4364 Esch-sur-Alzette, Luxembourg
